trans-unit.source: The handheld administration contains handhelds, handheld groups and handheld rights.

seg-source.mrk: The handheld administration contains handhelds, handheld groups and handheld rights.

trans-unit.source: This section describes the settings and fields of the handhelds, explains how to create and administer handhelds in Microsoft Dynamics NAV, and shows how to assign handhelds to groups and grant/remove rights to handhelds.

seg-source.mrk: This section describes the settings and fields of the handhelds, explains how to create and administer handhelds in Microsoft Dynamics NAV, and shows how to assign handhelds to groups and grant/remove rights to handhelds.

trans-unit.source: The Handheld page represents a mobile device or a handheld user. The handheld setup contains the creation/administration of handhelds and additional functionalities that are useful for administrating the handhelds.

seg-source.mrk: The Handheld page represents a mobile device or a handheld user.
The handheld setup contains the creation/administration of handhelds and additional functionalities that are useful for administrating the handhelds.

trans-unit.source: The General FastTab contains basic settings of the handheld.

seg-source.mrk: The General FastTab contains basic settings of the handheld.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of the handheld. This value is only important for Microsoft Dynamics NAV and does not have to be like the value entered in the PIN (Login) field.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of the handheld.
This value is only important for Microsoft Dynamics NAV and does not have to be like the value entered in the PIN (Login) field.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the (first) name of the handheld user or the name of the handheld.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the (first) name of the handheld user or the name of the handheld.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the username, card number or PIN, with which the user can login.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the username, card number or PIN, with which the user can login.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the password of the handheld user or device.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the password of the handheld user or device.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the language of the content that will be displayed to the user.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the language of the content that will be displayed to the user.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the handheld group of the handheld, which causes the handheld to inherit the group rights and group settings.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the handheld group of the handheld, which causes the handheld to inherit the group rights and group settings.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the start page of the handheld. If no value is set, the value of the handheld group or Mobile Setup is used.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the start page of the handheld.
If no value is set, the value of the handheld group or Mobile Setup is used.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a layout for the handheld, which allows different layouts for scanners or terminals to be used.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies a layout for the handheld, which allows different layouts for scanners or terminals to be used.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the handheld is blocked.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the handheld is blocked.

trans-unit.source: This FastTab contains user-specific settings of the handheld/user.

seg-source.mrk: This FastTab contains user-specific settings of the handheld/user.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the phone number of the handheld/user.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the phone number of the handheld/user.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the e-mail address of the handheld/user.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the e-mail address of the handheld/user.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Microsoft Dynamics NAV User ID if the handheld user also has a login to the Microsoft Dynamics NAV client.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the Microsoft Dynamics NAV User ID if the handheld user also has a login to the Microsoft Dynamics NAV client.

trans-unit.source: Displays the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Username depending on the selected User ID.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Username depending on the selected User ID.

trans-unit.source: Displays the path where created files are stored.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the path where created files are stored.

trans-unit.source: This field is used for informational purposes only.

seg-source.mrk: This field is used for informational purposes only.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default printer of the handheld. If no value is set, a printer selection will be shown before printing.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the default printer of the handheld.
If no value is set, a printer selection will be shown before printing.

trans-unit.source: Displays the last printer that was used for printing.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the last printer that was used for printing.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Company Name of the handheld, in case the handheld is related to another Company but set up in this Company.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the Company Name of the handheld, in case the handheld is related to another Company but set up in this Company.

trans-unit.source: In this FastTab the relations from the handheld to Microsoft Dynamics NAV Objects are set.

seg-source.mrk: In this FastTab the relations from the handheld to Microsoft Dynamics NAV Objects are set.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Salesperson Code to which the handheld should be assigned (if existing).

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Salesperson Code to which the handheld should be assigned (if existing).

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own Resource Journal Batch. This value is required if dialogues should be used for processing resource postings.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own Resource Journal Batch.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for processing resource postings.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to a resource (if existing).

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to a resource (if existing).

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own Item Journal Template. This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory or production.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own Item Journal Template.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory or production.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own Item Journal Batch. This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory or production.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own Item Journal Batch.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory or production.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to a location. This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory or production.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to a location.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory or production.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own Whse. Journal Template. This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory (only with Directed Put-away and Pick).

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own Whse.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory (only with Directed Put-away and Pick).

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own Whse. Journal Batch. This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory (only with Directed Put-away and Pick).

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own Whse.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for processes in inventory (only with Directed Put-away and Pick).

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own Job Journal Template. This value is required if dialogues should be used for job processes.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own Job Journal Template.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for job processes.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own Job Journal Batch. This value is required if dialogues should be used for job processes.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own Job Journal Batch.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for job processes.

trans-unit.source: For the usage of cc|factory data capture in cc|mobile solutions, an FDC Resource can be assigned to the handheld. In this case, in each dialogue this FDC Resource will be used for that handheld.

seg-source.mrk: For the usage of cc|factory data capture in cc|mobile solutions, an FDC Resource can be assigned to the handheld.
In this case, in each dialogue this FDC Resource will be used for that handheld.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own TDC Input Journal Template. This value is required if dialogues should be used for cc|factory data capture.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own TDC Input Journal Template.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for cc|factory data capture.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the handheld to an own TDC Input Journal Batch. This value is required if dialogues should be used for cc|factory data capture.

seg-source.mrk: Assigns the handheld to an own TDC Input Journal Batch.
This value is required if dialogues should be used for cc|factory data capture.

trans-unit.source: The Process group on the Home tab of the ribbon contains three actions. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Process group on the Home tab of the ribbon contains three actions.
Each is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Handheld Right page and displays all rights that are assigned to the handheld. This includes group rights and individual rights.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Handheld Right page and displays all rights that are assigned to the handheld.
This includes group rights and individual rights.

trans-unit.source: The Process group on the Actions tab of the ribbon contains four actions. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Process group on the Actions tab of the ribbon contains four actions.
Each is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Creates a subfolder in the root directory of the HTTP-Server with the name of the identifier (No.) of the handheld. This folder is required because all created pages are stored there.

seg-source.mrk: Creates a subfolder in the root directory of the HTTP-Server with the name of the identifier (No.) of the handheld.
This folder is required because all created pages are stored there.

trans-unit.source: Deletes all files in the created handheld folder and the folder itself.

seg-source.mrk: Deletes all files in the created handheld folder and the folder itself.

trans-unit.source: Deletes all files in the folder.

seg-source.mrk: Deletes all files in the folder.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the content of all handheld folders.

seg-source.mrk: Deletes the content of all handheld folders.

trans-unit.source: A handheld group combines multiple handhelds into a group. For example, handhelds of the type “inventory employee”, “production employee” and so on can be combined into groups.

seg-source.mrk: A handheld group combines multiple handhelds into a group.
For example, handhelds of the type “inventory employee”, “production employee” and so on can be combined into groups.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Defines the Handheld Group Code of the Handheld Group.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the Handheld Group Code of the Handheld Group.

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of assigned handhelds.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of assigned handhelds.

trans-unit.source: Defines the start page that should be used for all handhelds in this group. This value is used when no start page is assigned to the handheld. If no value is set, the start page of the handheld or Mobile Setup is used.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the start page that should be used for all handhelds in this group.
This value is used when no start page is assigned to the handheld.
If no value is set, the start page of the handheld or Mobile Setup is used.

trans-unit.source: The Process group on the Home tab of the ribbon contains four actions. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Process group on the Home tab of the ribbon contains four actions.
Each is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Handheld List page, which displays all handhelds that are assigned to the group.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Handheld List page, which displays all handhelds that are assigned to the group.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Handheld Group Right page, which displays all rights that are assigned to the group.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Handheld Group Right page, which displays all rights that are assigned to the group.

trans-unit.source: The Handheld Rights Administration handles the assigning of rights to handheld groups and handhelds. This rights are required for requesting the documents. Handheld rights and handheld group rights can be created and edited here.

seg-source.mrk: The Handheld Rights Administration handles the assigning of rights to handheld groups and handhelds.
This rights are required for requesting the documents.
Handheld rights and handheld group rights can be created and edited here.

trans-unit.source: Creation and editing of rights is performed in the Handheld Right page.

seg-source.mrk: Creation and editing of rights is performed in the Handheld Right page.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Displays the Handheld No. for which the rights are set.

seg-source.mrk: for which the rights are set.

trans-unit.source: Displays the username/card no./PIN of the corresponding handheld.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the username/card no./PIN of the corresponding handheld.

trans-unit.source: Displays the start page of the handheld.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the start page of the handheld.

trans-unit.source: Displays the name of the handheld.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the name of the handheld.

trans-unit.source: Displays the username (Microsoft Dynamics NAV) of the handheld.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the username (Microsoft Dynamics NAV) of the handheld.

trans-unit.source: The lines of this page display the rights for the documents that are assigned to the handheld.

seg-source.mrk: The lines of this page display the rights for the documents that are assigned to the handheld.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the name of the document to which the handheld should get access. If this entry is a right that is inherited by a handheld group, it cannot be edited or removed.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the name of the document to which the handheld should get access.
If this entry is a right that is inherited by a handheld group, it cannot be edited or removed.

trans-unit.source: Displays the module of the document; used for information purposes only and cannot be edited.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the module of the document; used for information purposes only and cannot be edited.

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the corresponding page is available in the Document Editor.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if the corresponding page is available in the Document Editor.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the right is inherited from a group or not.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates whether the right is inherited from a group or not.

trans-unit.source: The Process group on the Home tab of the ribbon contains two actions. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Process group on the Home tab of the ribbon contains two actions.
Each is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Opens the Handheld Group Right page, which displays a list of all rights of the group of the handheld.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Handheld Group Right page, which displays a list of all rights of the group of the handheld.

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes the rights for all documents of a selected module.

seg-source.mrk: Adds or removes the rights for all documents of a selected module.

trans-unit.source: Handheld group rights can be created and edited in the Handheld Group Right page.

seg-source.mrk: Handheld group rights can be created and edited in the Handheld Group Right page.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Displays the code of the handheld group.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the code of the handheld group.

trans-unit.source: Displays the description of the handheld group.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the description of the handheld group.

trans-unit.source: Displays the start page of the handheld group.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the start page of the handheld group.

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of assigned handhelds.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of assigned handhelds.

trans-unit.source: The lines show all rights of the handheld group that are assigned to the documents.

seg-source.mrk: The lines show all rights of the handheld group that are assigned to the documents.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the name of the page to which the group should get access.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the name of the page to which the group should get access.

trans-unit.source: Non-editable field that displays the module of the page.

seg-source.mrk: Non-editable field that displays the module of the page.

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the corresponding page is available in the Document Editor.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if the corresponding page is available in the Document Editor.

trans-unit.source: The Process group on the Home tab of the ribbon contains one action that is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Process group on the Home tab of the ribbon contains one action that is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes the rights for all documents of a selected module.

seg-source.mrk: Adds or removes the rights for all documents of a selected module.
